title: Full build tank vs full build adc, who wins?
body:
Situation, It's a 1v1 in the mid lane, no minions, both are level 18
Skill level of each is around gold

If I were to run game after game after game after hundreds of games, every adc against every tank, which side which end up having the most wins?
Why?
(e.g. ADCs' outscale tanks in damage in teamfights but lack the instant damage to stop one in a 1v1)
Just curious

replies.body: ADC no question. Damage just outscales defense no matter what you do, the only outliers might be Malphite and Rammus, and even those 2 still get wrecked by heavy armor pen.

"every adc against ever tank"
so vayne versus every tank including malphite, count how many wins she gets, then say cait vs every tank, count how many wins she gets and so on.

Asking since a lot of the time in my games (as well as youtue videos such as qtpie when he starts 1v1ing a maokai as caitlin, qt has some kills meanwhile maokai is like 0/4 or something, and maokai wins.

that video was a bit ago so some changes have been made,  but I also find it difficult to kite a strong tank such as malphite  as miss furtune and live (I'm not very good at adc as it is so I didn't know if it was just the match up or me)
